strength.name: Strength
strength.description: Strength measures bodily power, athletic training, and the extent to which you can exert raw physical force.
strength.saving_throw_description: A Strength saving throw can model any attempt to lift, push, pull, or break something, to force your body through a space, or to otherwise apply brute force to a situation.

dexterity.name: Dexterity
dexterity.description: Dexterity measures agility, reflexes, and balance.
dexterity.saving_throw_description: A Dexterity saving throw can model any attempt to move nimbly, quickly, or quietly, or to keep from falling on tricky footing.

constitution.name: Constitution
constitution.description: Constitution measures health, stamina, and vital force.
constitution.saving_throw_description: Constitution saving throws are uncommon, and no skills apply to Constitution checks, because the endurance this ability represents is largely passive rather than involving a specific effort on the part of a character or monster.

intelligence.name: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Intelligence measures reasoning ability, memory, and the ability to learn.
intelligence.saving_throw_description: An Intelligence saving throw comes into play when you need to draw on logic, education, memory, or deductive reasoning.

wisdom.name: Wisdom
wisdom.description: Wisdom reflects how attuned you are to the world around you and represents perceptiveness and intuition.
wisdom.saving_throw_description: A Wisdom saving throw might reflect a struggle to resist a spell, a trap, or other effect that assaults or deceives your senses.

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description: Charisma measures your ability to interact effectively with others. It includes such factors as confidence and eloquence, and it can represent a charming or commanding personality.
charisma.saving_throw_description: A Charisma saving throw comes into play when you need to make a good impression, tell a convincing lie, or when you are wrestling with an effect that would subsume your personality or psyche.
